title: PM to hold bilateral meeting with Spanish President today: Marriyum
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 20 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Marriyum Aurangzeb said on Tuesday that Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif would hold bilateral meeting with Spanish President Pedro SÃ¡nchez at sidelines of UN General Assembly 2022 session today.
https://twitter.com/Marriyum_A/status/1572152047163834368?s=20&t=iFfdQESljg8AyectGfSaGA
Using her twitter handle, she said that both sides would explore opportunities for enhancing bilateral cooperation in areas of trade, climate change and mutual national interests.
